attributes.action: ALL NEW BUILD PROPERTIES `MUST` BE BUILT WITH `ENERGY` SAVING BUILT IN.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT TO SEE `ALL` NEW BUILD PROPERTIES BUILT WITH `FULL ENERGY SAVING` ITEMS BUILT INTO THEM, SUCH AS TRIPLE GLAZING, SOLAR PANELS, HIGH SPEC INSULATION, BOILERS `A` PLUS RATED, WATER SAVING UNITS, AT THIS TIME IT IS BEING VERY SHORT SITED USING UP THE RESOURCES AT A FAST RATE WITHOUT THINKING ABOUT WHAT HAPPENS WHEN IT RUNS OUT IN THE FUTURE, MORE CARS LESS FUEL, MORE HOUSES LESS GAS AND ELECTRIC AND HIGH PRICES, SHOULD BE COMMON SENSE FOR OUR CHILDRENS AND THERE`S.

AT THIS TIME ENERGY IS JUST BEING WASTED AT A FAST RATE, NOT JUST HERE BUT EVERYWHERE IN THE WORLD WITH NOTHING TO FALL BACK ON, ONCE IT`S GONE ITS GONE FOR GOOD.

THINK OF THE FUTURE.
